citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The indoor areas of the kennel were clean, however the outdoor part of three enclosures had soiled waste/excreta in
areas that dogs could not really walk around. Daily waste removal from the dogs' outdoor area of the enclosure helps
provide for the dogs' comfort and health. Excreta and food waste must be removed daily from primary enclosures and
often enough to keep dogs from contacting the waste.
***Correct by 1/25/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The indoor areas of the kennel were clean, however the outdoor part of three enclosures had soiled waste/excreta in 
areas that dogs could not really walk around. Daily waste removal from the dogs' outdoor area of the enclosure helps 
provide for the dogs' comfort and health. Excreta and food waste must be removed daily from primary enclosures and 
often enough to keep dogs from contacting the waste.  
***Correct by 1/25/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
